sentence: Great resort in a beautiful tranquil setting
SpaExcelent massage and a very relaxing experience
I had experience Watsu program at the spa
The service is faultless and the staff here really ca nt do enough for you they create a wonderful relaxing environment where guests want for nothing

This is in line with the overall experience we had with everyone from the chef his sous chef and the whole restaurant staff who were always offering to accommodate special requests which we did not have because we stayed for eleven nights and they were worried we got bored with the offering
The environment is perfect and all equipment are well maintained
All these attributes delivered to my family fond and lasting experiences and memories of a wonderful holiday
Fabulous villas and setting
BEST EXPERIENCE IN MY LIFE
We upgraded to a Seaview Pool Villa and would totally recommend this as the experience is fantastic and great for romantic sunsets in your own pool what more could you ask for
Naka Island is an experience I have never had before until recently

sentence: Chick in體驗不錯，有簡單的敲鐘儀式，沒有毛巾冰水提供！Chick out體驗有待提高，沒有了辦理入住時的熱情！期望能真正做到真誠相待！因為能在這裏消費的中國人如果的確得到了滿意的服務是會給小費的！總體不錯！Chick in had a good experience with a simple bell ringing ceremony no face towels and ice waterThe Chick out experience needs to be improved and there is no enthusiasm for checking inHope to truly treat each other sincerelyBecause the Chinese who can spend here will tip if they really get satisfactory serviceOveral good
The experience of Naka Island is the real treat
That was an unexpected but super fun experience3
While the view and ambience was nice the steak would have been more at home at a TGI Fridays tough fatty and small
In summary not a bad resort but hugely expensive for your overall experience and does n’t look after Bonvoy Members
It is so hard to find a resort in Phuket that could match the overall setting and the layout of the individual villas
To be fair this is not the resorts fault they get everything right it ’s just not the kind of place for you if you want to experience Thailand
So plan to either do nothing and come home with little experience of the country or plan a trip out every day
PS the older style thatched roof villas are prone to leaks in the roof as we experienced during an afternoon downpour
